sentence.Network_en: This is it, last straw, thats all, thats it.
sentence.Network_cn: 就是它, 最后一击, 就这样, 就是它.

sentence.Network_en: Thats a good idea, but Ill go to a concert.
sentence.Network_cn: 好主意, 可我要去听音乐会.

sentence.Network_en: I think thats how Evra repays the kindness Ji has given him.
sentence.Network_cn: 我想这就是他报答朴智星的方式吧.

PerfectNetExp.abs: thats why nobody gives a shit about YOU ., 这就是为什么也没人在乎你.
thats the reason youre not here ., 那就是为什么你不在这里.
dont make up anything thats breaking all your fingers ., 不要弥补多数民众赞成什么打破所有的手指.
but thats why you couldnt stay ., 但那正是你要离去的原因.
